help-file.title: SNEAK
help-file.content:
Syntax: sneak (for Assassin, Unholy-Piper, Bard) sneak off
This allows you to move silently from one place to another. A person who sneaks successfully will be able to travel (for a period of time) without anyone taking notice of his or her arrival or departure. As with most learned skills, there is always a chance that you will not sneak successfully and, with this particular command, you will be unable to tell if it has worked or not. You can quit sneaking with "sneak off."
